data.title: “Take a breath and enjoy life as it’s happening.” -Lauren Davidson’s “Soaking Up Every Second”
data.meta_description: Country Music Association (CMA) Artist and Recording Academy (Grammy) Member Lauren Davidson is a New York City/New Jersey based singer-songwriter with a unique and powerful voice. Davidson has…
data.text:
What can you do in an acoustic version of a song that you can’t in a full band one?

I always love the energy of a full band but I think when songs are stripped down it allows the listener to pay more attention to the lyrics and the story and that’s at the core of all of my music.

What is it like to sing the National Anthem?

Incredible. It’s nerve wracking for sure because it’s such a special song but there is no feeling like…
